item.description:
Hi Everyone,

It looks like the weather is going to be nice Tuesday. Let's meet to skate the Minuteman Trail. We'll go at a leisurely pace. I'll be on the trail behind Not Your Average Joe's. On the trail directly down from the parking lot driveway is a sign on a stand with information about Arlington Center's history. You can see it in the photo above. I'll post a Meetup sign on it. As long as the Meetup sign is there I'm around. I may be at my car or sitting on the bench-like rock putting on my skates. Just wait by the sign. We'll wait until about 6:40 p.m. (not 7:10 p.m.) or so and then take off. If you choose not to post a photo of yourself, please be aware that I will not walk up to random people on skates and ask if they are with the Meetup, you'll will need to approach me.

If the weather prediction changes, i.e. rain or cold, I will cancel and schedule for another day.

Dee
item.how_to_find_us: Not your Average Joe's is at 645 Mass Ave in Arlington. Next to it is a driveway to the parking lot. We'll meet on the trail accessible from the parking lot. I'll post a Meetup sign on the sign stand in the picture. (Driveway is in background.)
item.why: So far the weather looks like it's going to be nice.
item.name: Minuteman Trail skate
